name: KryptoPets
description: $KPETS is an ERC-20 based token focused on establishing the Kryptopets Metaverse - an NFT based Play-To-Earn blockchain-game. Play along community members as ‘Trainers’ of their own individual living NFT pets — Kryptopets by joining an Alliance and participate in Alliance events, unlock special rewards and Battle in the Arena and Tournaments as part of the Kryptopets Metaverse League!
